ValidationRule.description: Locked opportunities cannot be changed by other users, only system administrators can edit closed opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.BYPASS_ALL_VALIDATIONS_ON_OPPTY), ISCHANGED(StageName), TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) = 'Closed Won', NOT( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only system administrators can edit closed won opportunities. Please reach out to SFDC support for assistance.
